ygData.messageBody:
i have not heard anyone necro who can solo 3-4 blues AT THE SAME TIME...w/
ward undead , i can keep soloing 3 blue skelly until i have to meditate but
never the same time. Past level 15 and blue creature generally hit you for
25-40 dmg+, and there is no way u can take 3-4 blues cuz ur spell will keep
getting interrupted and u aren't gonna survive giving the puny hp a necro
has( of course we know wizard has the least hp in the game).

IMO, at later levels, necro will has a hard time becuz grouping will shine.
Wizard is sough after by everyone but nobody wants a necro in their group
becuz necros aren't really that useful .
